forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
